title: LFM Diamond+ Mid/Top
body:
Looking for a Diamond+ Mid and Top laner to join a serious team. Team was previously challenger but has decayed and we are looking to start it up again.

Add me in game

replies.body:
Hi there Barnesy! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
